Name: Shadow Arena
About the game: Step into the battlefield shrouded in darkness. Choose to team up with other players to form a group of 3 or put your skills to the test to become the last one standing. Experience a new style of action PvP where the ferocity of battles and the clashing of weapons echoes across the battlefield. GAME FEATURES DIVERSE HERO ROSTER From sword-wielders to archers and mages to brawlers, select from an array of unique Heroes and master your own playstyle. Dominate your opponents by using skills, chaining combos, or by playing strategic mind games! Action-pack, Various tactics Stand victorious by using brilliant skills and cunning! Dive into the action-packed fights unique to Shadow Arena. STRATEGIC HUNTS Implement everything you find on the battlefield into your combat strategy. Seek out monsters that drop powerful gear or buffs, use Altars to summon fearsome dragons and Ancient Weapons, or carefully use consumable items for that extra boost. There's always an opportunity to turn the tides of battle in the arena. How to Play Are you a team player or a lone wolf? Shadow Arena has all the modes that suits your game mode. Take on the battle on your own in “Solo” or choose “Trio” to team-up in a group of 3 and devise strategies to dominate the arena. Feeling bold? Jump into a round of Deathmatch or 1v1 and enjoy different sub-modes that Shadow Arena has to offer!
